item.description:
JiffyCon is a tradition going back 4-5 years, bringing the storygamers of the Greenfield MA area together with those of Boston MA. It's traditionally held twice a year: in Greenfield in fall and in Davis Sq.

Note that this event is NOT being organized by us at the RPFGB. So clicking on the RSVP on this meetup page is just a way of letting your friends know that you're planning to attend JiffyCon.

To actually register for Jiffycon, go to their website http://www.jiffycon.c...
item.name: JiffyCon
